source: Ina so in rufe asusun banki na. Me zan yi?
guideline: Label the user’s intent for a banking support flow.

source: Iṣẹ́ oníbàárà wọn dáa gan-an, mo ní ìrírí rere.
Majibu yako hayana heshima hata kidogo.
guideline: Decide if the text violates respectful-language policy.

source:
Tambaya: Me ya kamata in yi idan katin ATM dina ya makale?
Amsa: Ka kira lambar cibiyar taimako ko ka ziyarci reshe mafi kusa don sakin katin.
guideline: Judge if the answer directly addresses the question.

source: Mo fẹ́ beèrè bí mo ṣe lè yí PIN kárìrìn-ọwọ́ mi padà.

SRC: The payment was declined due to insufficient funds.
TGT: Malipo yalikataliwa kwa sababu ya ukosefu wa fedha.
Aikinsu yana jinkiri sosai, ban gamsu ba.
Ìbáṣepọ̀ yìí kò tọ́, àti pé ìrọ̀lẹ́ yín burú.
guideline: Flag disrespect or abuse per policy.

source: Ninawezaje kuzuia miamala ya mtandaoni kwenye kadi yangu?
guideline: Choose the most precise banking intent.

source:
SRC: Please upload a clear photo of your ID.
TGT: Don Allah ku loda hoto mai kyau na katin shaidarku.
